content:
# Payment and Shipment | Wydawnictwo AGH

URL: https://www.wydawnictwo.agh.edu.pl/en/strona/584-payment-and-shipment
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:25:43

Payment and Shipment

Foreign order

Payment

In order to arrange payment details please contact 
wydawnictwa@agh.edu.pl

Payment in Euro should be wired to: Wydawnictwa AGH, al. Mickiewicza 30, 30-059 Krakow, Poland

Bank account number: IBAN PL49 1240 4722 1978 0000 4859 8327

SWIFT code: PKOPPLPW

Bank name and address: Bank Pekao, ul. Grzybowska 53/57, 00-844 Warszawa

Shipment

We ship worldwide. In order to arrange shipping details and cost please contact 
wydawnictwa@agh.edu.pl

Forein-language customers in Poland

Payment method: by bank transfer.

Deferred payment is possible for institutions only.

When ordering as an institution, please write your taxpayer identification number (NIP) and the note, "We authorize the AGH University Press to issue a VAT invoice without our signature."

Shipping cost should be added to the price of the book: 

Polish Post   15,00 PLN (including VAT)

Courier         21,00 PLN (including VAT)

InPost           15,00 PLN (including VAT) 

Shipment methods: Poczta Polska, courier, or Paczkomaty InPost.

For orders over PLN 200, shipping costs are borne by AGH University Press.

It is possible to pick up the order directly at the headquarters of AGH University Press: 17 Reymonta St., 30-059 Krakow. When purchasing directly at the AGH University Press' office, you can only pay by card or BLIK.
